root.title: Deep Learning
root.content:
Deep Learning

A subfield of machine learning based on artificial neural networks with many layers (deep neural networks). It has led to breakthroughs in many areas.

ann.title: Neural Networks
ann.content:
Artificial Neural Networks (ANNs)

Computing systems inspired by the biological neural networks that constitute animal brains. They consist of interconnected nodes (neurons) that process information.

cnn.title: Convolutional Neural Networks
cnn.content:
CNNs

A class of deep neural networks, most commonly applied to analyzing visual imagery. They are used in image and video recognition, image classification, and medical image analysis.

rnn.title: Recurrent Neural Networks
rnn.content:
RNNs

A class of artificial neural networks where connections between nodes form a directed graph along a temporal sequence. This allows them to exhibit temporal dynamic behavior, making them ideal for sequential data like text or time series.
